description: • Developing and implementing business strategies to drive growth and profitability in the competitive vacation rental market.
• Overseeing day-to-day operations, including managing property listings, guest inquiries, reservations, and ensuring a seamless guest experience.
• Leading and motivating a team of employees, including property managers, customer service representatives, and maintenance staff, to deliver exceptional service to guests.
• Managing budgets, setting pricing strategies, monitoring revenue and expenses, and ensuring financial sustainability.
• Ensuring compliance with local regulations, safety standards, and Airbnb policies to maintain a positive reputation and uphold legal requirements.
• Handling guest feedback, resolving issues, and maintaining high guest satisfaction levels to drive positive reviews and repeat business.
• Responsible for clerical tasks, organizing paperwork, scheduling appointments, and providing general administrative support.
• Oversees daily operations, manages administrative staff, handles budgets, and ensures office efficiency.
• Manages financial records, processes invoices, and assists with financial reporting.
• Manages employee relations, recruitment, training, and ensures compliance with labor laws.
• Handles purchasing materials needed for recycling operations, negotiates with suppliers, and maintains inventory.
• Addressed customer inquiries with timely and professional responses via phone, email and in-person interactions.
• Remedied issues quickly and effectively through active listening, conflict resolution, and dynamic communication skills.
• Tracked customer service cases, maintained accurate records and updated service software with customer information, scheduled customer appointments and customer complaints
• Preparing cost- benefit analysis for prospective and existing customers to determine most suitable purchase options.
• Followed up with customers about resolved issues to maintain high standards of customer service.
• Collaborated with staff members and other departments to enhance customer service experience and exceed team goals through effective client satisfaction rates.
• Assisted inspecting officers in verifying that appropriate loaders loaded sound cement bags and precise number of cements required by appropriate clients.
• Supervised workers in cleaning of loading bay, recycling bay and ensured that powdered cements in vessels were dispatched quickly from port to respective silos of the company
• Assisted shift supervisors in rotation of loaders respective shifts to ensure smooth flow of work and handling of production paper works
• Ensured that personal protective equipment were provided to workers in the plant to avoid harmful risks.
• Proved successful working within tight deadlines and a fast-paced environment.
• Paid attention to detail while completing assignments.
• Prepared in advance for and addressed production problems to prevent avoidable delays in delivery of products to customers.
• Assisted in handling budget, office reporting, invoicing and providing top-notch customer service.
• Updated reports, managed accounts and inventories, and generated reports for company database.
• Communicated corporate objectives to various divisions to meet deadlines and adhere to company budgets.
• Answered multi-line phone system, routing calls, delivering messages to staff and greeting visitors.
• Scheduled office meetings and client appointments for staff teams.
